CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 20-24 We have previously demonstrated a novel naphtho-[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole) ( NT ) moiety with enlarged planarity relative to conventionally used acceptor of 2,1,3benzothiadiazole ( BT ) , which can be used as a strong acceptor for D-A polymers.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| naphtho-[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole) ( NT ) |
| 2,1,3benzothiadiazole ( BT ) |

The two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "naphtho-[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole) ( NT )" and "2,1,3benzothiadiazole ( BT )".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| naphtho-[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole) |
| 2,1,3benzothiadiazole |

After removing the abbreviations ( NT ) and ( BT ), the two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "naphtho-[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole)" and "2,1,3benzothiadiazole".
